skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 35% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn.
skills.name: Vanity Fists
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Removes all [Increase DEF] buffs from enemies before attacking. Places an extra hit if this attack kills an enemy.
skills.name: Explosive Temper
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.desc: Places a 50% [Increase ACC] buff on all allies for 3 turns. Also places a 30% [Increase C. DMG] buff on this Champion for 3 turns, then grants an Extra Turn.
skills.name: Roar of Victory

skills.desc:
Decreases the damage this Champion receives from critical hits by 20%. Counterattacks the attacker when hit with a critical hit.

Has a 50% chance of counterattacking the attacker when hit with a strong, normal or weak hit.
skills.name: Affronted [P]
